name: Clin M
title: Clinical M
notes:
**Note 1:**  In-transit metastasis is coded in N (regional lymph nodes).

**Note 2:**  Nodes in contiguous (secondary) and bidirectional (cephalad/caudal) primary nodal basins are coded in N (regional lymph nodes).
